name: .ODKBUILD File Extension
summary: Learn about .ODKBUILD files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an ODKBUILD file in ODK Build (cross-platform). To do so, select File â†’ Load Form from File... from ODK Build's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your ODKBUILD file.

The title, form fields, and field properties an ODKBUILD file contains are defined by JSON text. If you want to view your ODKBUILD file as JSON text, you can open the file in Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac), or any other text or source code editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
